page.title: 15FARMING IN THE NEW FOREST
page.content: Last summer we went strawberry picking for our first time .You can go picking from July till the end of the summer.When we got there we had these small plastic baskets and then we started picking.Most of the time we were eating them not picking them . You can either keep them and pay for how much you picked or you can get payed for how much you picked but you dont get the strawberries . When we had enough we went home and had strawberries with sugar on top {YUM YUM YUM.} In the New Forest there are lots of strawberry picking areas where you can go .Other than srawberries you can pick potatoes, sweetcorn as well and maybe other things.
